dct_description_sm: Issued January 1879 C.P. Patterson Superintendent. Verified J.E. Hilgard Assistant in charge of Office ; Triangulation by R.D. Cutts & C. Rockwell Assists. ; Topography by C. Rockwell ; Hydrography by E. Cordell Assist.
Depths shown by soundings and gradient shading (in low water areas); relief by contours and spot heights
Bar scales in statute miles, nautical miles, kilometers
Tidal information; buoy legend; notes on 1887 course, elevations, and soundings
Shows drainage, vegetation, topography, low water areas, islands, buildings, roads, divisions of land
